name: K&L Gates GP - Brussels
goal: K&L Gates Brussels provides legal and policy advice to international clients on both current and upcoming EU legislation and regulatory developments and assists them to interact with EU authorities.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: K&L Gates Brussels follows EU initiatives and policy in a variety of sectors, including financial services, digital economy, international trade, transport and fashion and luxury.
customers: Trans-Atlantic Business Council,U.S. Chamber of Commerce - Center for Capital Market Competitiveness
